subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari, a 6-foot-8, 210-pound small forward, is a versatile scorer but will be a work-in-progress as he makes his transition to the N.B.A.
snippet: Danilo Gallinari, a 6-foot-8, 210-pound small forward, is a versatile scorer but will be a work-in-progress as he makes his transition to the N.B.A.
